law.catch_line: The Department shall establish 3 separate areas of 10 acres of submerged land each for oyster propag...
law.text:
The Department shall establish 3 separate areas of 10 acres of submerged land each for oyster propagation research in the vicinity of:
Horn Point in Cambridge in Dorchester County;
Deale Island in Somerset County; and
The waters of St. Mary's County, other than in the Potomac River.
